description: Adds Qintel QSentry metadata to intel logs.
tags: log, logging, intel, qintel, qsentry, intelligenece, threat intelligence, ti
readme:
# Qintel QSentry

This package adds enhanced logging for Qintel QSentry intelligence feeds when
integrated with Zeek's Intel Framework. This maps the Qintel QSentry custom
fields into a QSentry nested object in the intel.log file.
